## Problema resolvido

### Causa do erro
- Astro configurado com `base: "/REQ-2025.2-T01-PPBM"`
- Link estava usando `/evidencias/sprint-1/` sem o base path
- Resultado: 404 Not Found

### Corre√ß√£o aplicada
```astro
<Button href="/REQ-2025.2-T01-PPBM/evidencias/sprint-1/" variant="link">
  Ir para Evid√™ncias da Sprint 1
</Button>
```

### Verifica√ß√£o
- Link corrigido retorna 200 OK
- Sem erros de linting
- Bot√£o com estilo de link azul funcionando

### Para testar

2. Clique no bot√£o azul "Ir para Evid√™ncias da Sprint 1"
3. Deve redirecionar para as evid√™ncias da Sprint 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,56 @@
- 
+ import * as React from "react"
+ import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
+ import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
+ 
+ import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
+ 
+ const buttonVariants = cva(
+   "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0",
+   {
+     variants: {
+       variant: {
+         default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
+         destructive:
+           "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90",
+         outline:
+           "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
+         secondary:
+           "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
+         ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
+         link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
+       },
+       size: {
+         default: "h-10 px-4 py-2",
+         sm: "h-9 px-3",
+         lg: "h-11 px-8",
+         icon: "h-10 w-10",
+       },
+     },
+     defaultVariants: {
+       variant: "default",
+       size: "default",
+     },
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ export interface ButtonProps
+   extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
+     VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
+   asChild?: boolean
+ }
+ 
+ const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
+   ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
+     const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
+     return (
+       <Comp
+         className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
+         ref={ref}
+         {...props}
+       />
+     )
+   }
+ )
+ Button.displayName = "Button"
+ 
+ export { Button, buttonVariants }
```

</details>

## shadcn/ui configurado

### Configura√ß√£o conclu√≠da

1. Tailwind CSS instalado
2. Depend√™ncias instaladas:
   - `class-variance-authority`
   - `clsx`
   - `tailwind-merge`
   - `lucide-react`
   - `@radix-ui/react-slot`
   - `tailwindcss-animate`

3. Arquivos criados:
   - `components.json` ‚Äî configura√ß√£o do shadcn/ui
   - `tailwind.config.mjs` ‚Äî configura√ß√£o do Tailwind
   - `src/lib/utils.ts` ‚Äî utilit√°rios
   - `src/components/ui/button.tsx` ‚Äî componente Button
   - `src/components/ButtonLink.tsx` ‚Äî wrapper para links

4. Configura√ß√µes atualizadas:
   - `astro.config.mjs` ‚Äî aliases de path (`@`)
   - `tsconfig.json` ‚Äî paths do TypeScript
   - `src/styles/global.css` ‚Äî vari√°veis CSS do shadcn/ui

### Componente implementado

```tsx
// ButtonLink.tsx
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"

export function ButtonLink({ href, children }: ButtonLinkProps) {
  return (
    <Button variant="link" asChild>
      <a href={href}>
        {children}
      </a>
    </Button>
  )
}
```

## Problema resolvido

### Corre√ß√£o aplicada
Simplifiquei o componente `ButtonLink` para usar um `<a>` com classes CSS diretas, evitando `asChild` e `Slot` do Radix UI.

### Componente atualizado
```tsx
export function ButtonLink({ href, children }: ButtonLinkProps) {
  return (
    <a href={href} className="text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline font-medium">
      {children}
    </a>
  )
}
```

### Verifica√ß√µes
- Link de destino retorna 200 OK
- Sem erros de linting
- Estilo shadcn/ui mantido (text-primary, underline-offset-4, hover:underline)

### Para testar
Acesse: http://localhost:4321/REQ-2025.2-T01-PPBM/atas/ata3/

O bot√£o deve aparecer como um link azul com sublinhado no hover e redirecionar para as evid√™ncias da Sprint 1.
